
{{alias}}( fcn[, hashFunction] )
    Returns a memoized function.

    Notes:

    - The implementation does not set the `length` of the returned function.
      Accordingly, the returned function `length` is always `0`.
    - The evaluation context is always `null`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    fcn: Function
        Function to memoize.

    hashFunction: Function (optional)
        Function to map a set of arguments to a single value identifying that
        set.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Function
        Memoized function.

    Examples
    --------
    > function factorial( n ) {
    >     var prod;
    >     var i;
    >     prod = 1;
    >     for ( i = n; i > 1; i-- ) {
    >         prod *= i;
    >     }
    >     return prod;
    > }
    > var memoized = {{alias}}( factorial );
    > var v = memoized( 5 )
    120
    > v = memoized( 5 )
    120

    See Also
    --------
